description: Provides an overview of health disparities in the United States, including existence and magnitude of health disparities, theories that explain health disparities, strategies to address their complexity, and solution required to eliminate them. Disparities are examined related to groups of diverse racial/ethnic backgrounds, socio-economic status, gender, age, and ability level.
label: Health Disparities in the U.S.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Grand Challenge-Health/Well, and US Minority Culture(s) course.
